title: Connair J. S. Russell
text:
GitHub
  
  
    
     Twitter
  
  
    
     . Google Scholar
  
  
    
     Linkedin
  

  
  


I am currently a postdoc working as a Research Fellow at Queen’s University Belfast, on the core Explaining Atheism project.
I am interested in the Cognitive Science of Religion, or more specifically, the Cognitive Science of Non-Religion. The Explaining Atheism project is investigating the major psychological and social factors influencing non-belief (e.g. Cognitive Biases, Religious Socialisation). We are examining this across cultures, and in particular, we look to use modern causal inference techniques to look at the causal pathways to non-belief (as best we can).
Prior to joining the EA team i completed my PhD in 2022. Based at the Max Planck Institute for Human Development in Berlin, my PhD looked at cognitive biases in how we learn and generalise different kinds of information.





Cognitive Science of Religion








 PhD in Psychology, 2022

Max Planck Institute for Human Development, & Freie Universität Berlin

title: Building a Simple Shiny Dashboard in R
text:
This is a post with code.


Code
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(mpg) +
  geom_jitter(aes(cty, hwy), size = 4, alpha = 0.5)
